author: kamrul
msg: Closes GH-0014 oozie-default.xml in documentation is not displayed
Fixed extension in link. Added XSL for browsers to display the contents
of the oozie-default.xml.
Removed addition of the log4j config file to docs as it is not used.
From: Alejandro Abdelnur <tucu00@gmail.com>

author: kamrul
msg: Closes GH-0019 missing internal repo reference for artifacts in main POM
currently the main POM contains the internal repo reference
(a local dir) for plugins only, it should be there for artifacts also.
From: Alejandro Abdelnur <tucu00@gmail.com>

author: kamrul
msg: GH-0017 XTestCase starts minicluster with hardcoded group for proxyusers
This patch must be applied on top of GH-0003
Starting minicluster using getTestGroup() for proxyuser group.
From: Alejandro Abdelnur <tucu00@gmail.com>

author: kamrul
msg: Closes GH-0016 Enable build to include Hadoop JARs in oozie.war
The generated Oozie WAR does not include the Hadoop JARs.
Add a build option that would force the inclusion of the Hadoop JARs
used for building Oozie.
Default behavior should be the current one (no Hadoop JARs in the WAR)
From: Alejandro Abdelnur <tucu00@gmail.com>

author: kamrul
msg: Closes GH-0015 oozie client shell script has an invalid/not-needed variable
Removing invalid $EXECCLASS variable.
From: Alejandro Abdelnur <tucu00@gmail.com>
